mapper.select: insert into TB_EVENT values( #{event_no}, #{event_title}, #{event_content}, #{event_img}, to_date(#{event_start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{event_end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 0, sysdate, #{event_link})
select * from tb_event where to_date(#{now}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') > event_start and event_end > to_date(#{now}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
